description:
net: remove types InvalidConnError and UnknownSocketError

Both are unused and undocumented.

InvalidConnError is also non-idiomatic: a FooError type can
typically describe something, else it would be an ErrFoo
variable.

messages.text:
Nothing in the standard library.  all.bash passes.

> if you are certain that no one uses it.

LGTM,

Alex

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg

You are right. Always paranoid me :-)
Blow it away!

Alex

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=572b461e1ee2 ***

net: remove types InvalidConnError and UnknownSocketError

Both are unused and undocumented.

InvalidConnError is also non-idiomatic: a FooError type can
typically describe something, else it would be an ErrFoo
variable.

R=golang-dev, alex.brainman
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5609045

subject: code review 5609045: net: remove the InvalidConnError type
